title: Language Education Workshop for Distance Learning Design and Improving Parental Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A workshop for language education professionals aiming to strengthen parent-teacher collaboration amid expanded remote learning post-COVID-19. Sharing effective remote learning design methods in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can apply three digital creativity task-design principles to propose strategies for reducing parental stress and enhancing learning engagement.
Participants can explain five core elements to consider when integrating web-conferencing classes with offline activities.
Participants can develop an assessment rubric to enhance learner autonomy when designing smartphone-based language learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
